author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Q2 Holdings Announces Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.13
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Q2 Holdings Inc:
* Q2 HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 23 PERCENT TO $51.7 MILLION * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.13 * SEES Q1 2018 TOTAL REVENUE OF $52.6 MILLION TO $53.2 MILLION
* SEES FULL-YEAR 2018 TOTAL REVENUE OF $234 MILLION TO $236 MILLION
* SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA OF POSITIVE $1.4 MILLION TO POSITIVE $2 MILLION
* SEES FULL-YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA OF POSITIVE $19 MILLION TO POSITIVE $21 MILLION
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $51.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $54.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $240.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
